1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Qais bin Sa'd said:"The Prophet came to us and we gave him water to perform a bath." Then we brought him a Warshiyyah cloth, and he wrapped himself in it. It is as if I can see the marks of the Wars on the folds of his stomach

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمِنْدِيلِ بَعْدَ الْوُضُوءِ وَبَعْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: (Drying oneself with) a cloth after ablution or bathing
